phrases.phrase: future perfect ( the future perfect tense )

vlive.korean: 그래서 네 인생도 쫑났냐? So, do you have no future, too? 듣기 View video OSEN : Golden Child 골든차일드, 컴백무대보다 더 떨린다는 연기대결(ft.이태원클라쓰) #스타로드 07
vlive.english: So, do you have no future, too?

vlive.korean: 앞으로 우즈가 해야 할 일? What WOODZ has to do in the future? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : [full] WOODZ 1ST MINI ALBUM [EQUAL] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: What WOODZ has to do in the future?

vlive.korean: 앞으로 사실 만날 일이 또 있죠? You'll be meeting more in the future, right? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : [full] WOODZ 1ST MINI ALBUM [EQUAL] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: You'll be meeting more in the future, right?

vlive.korean: [도전해 보고 싶은 음악 장르가 있다면?] [What genre would you like to try in the future?] View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] 화사의 NEW 소울푸드는? ┃미니 인터뷰 (HWASA)
vlive.english: [What genre would you like to try in the future?]

vlive.korean: 먼 훗날 팬분들에게 이 'Nothin''이 - 어떤 곡으로 기억됐으면 좋겠어요? In the future, for my fans, - How would you like it to be remembered? 듣기 View video EXO : 세훈&찬열의 '10억뷰' COUNTDOWN LIVE (Paradise View)
vlive.english: In the future, for my fans, - How would you like it to be remembered?

examples.korean: The interviewer asked me about my future plans. 발음듣기 면접관이 나의 장래 계획에 대해 물었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The interviewer asked me about my future plans. 발음

examples.korean: The future looks bleak for the fishing industry. 발음듣기 어업의 미래는 암울해 보인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The future looks bleak for the fishing industry. 발음

examples.korean: He enunciated his vision of the future. 발음듣기 그는 미래에 대해 자신이 생각하는 바를 밝혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He enunciated his vision of the future. 발음

examples.korean: The omens for their future success are not good. 발음듣기 그들이 장차 성공할 조짐이 좋지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The omens for their future success are not good. 발음

examples.korean: He obstinately refused to consider the future. 발음듣기 그는 앞날을 고려해 보기를 완강히 거부했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He obstinately refused to consider the future. 발음
